body:
So I hop on quintus and im at the monument so what i do is incase myself and im breaking the glowstone but guess what, that glowstone doesn't even break and it glitches me up and down https://youtu.be/6YP5qPx1Xt4
Throwback was fine but now it has just gone back to normal, it makes me feel sick. 
Please could you do something about this It was fine before but its just gone back to normal.

title: This sometimes does make me want to quit

replies.body: When that happens quickly place blocks under you. Because that make the glowstone reappear then break it again. It works for me
replies.body_tagged: When that happens quickly place blocks under you. Because that make the glowstone reappear then break it again. It works for me

replies.body: Ok.. its just what I want to know is why they added this anticheat back
replies.body_tagged: Ok.. its just what I want to know is why they added this anticheat back

replies.body: This happens to me when I'm standing on a fence and I jump and place a block
replies.body_tagged: This happens to me when I'm standing on a fence and I jump and place a block

replies.body: This was a server-wide problem - no one could do anything. No one could pvp, and everyone kept breaking the mons because no one could hit them
replies.body_tagged: This was a server-wide problem - no one could do anything. No one could pvp, and everyone kept breaking the mons because no one could hit them

replies.body: It's the server being glitchy. Happened ever since the anti cheat was brought back. Rubber bands, poor hit detection, block lag and even going through blocks you place.
replies.body_tagged: It's the server being glitchy. Happened ever since the anti cheat was brought back. Rubber bands, poor hit detection, block lag and even going through blocks you place.

replies.body: Calm down don't feel sick over glowstone. Can't tell you anything besides its a glitch, I recommend placing blocks under you quickly as well.
replies.body_tagged: Calm down don't feel sick over glowstone. Can't tell you anything besides its a glitch, I recommend placing blocks under you quickly as well.

replies.body: The server was restarted a couple hours ago to fix the problems. If you do however see another bug make sure to post it in GitHub.
